title: I'm scared to go home and check my account (Permaban wave today)
body:
I am frightened, Riot is ultra draconian and loves to permaban innocent players, as was evidenced with my case earlier this year.

I hope my account is safe.

**Edit**:
I am enjoying watching the very .... 'unique' people that think I am banned. It becomes increasingly amusing with each one.

For those unable to follow the plot , let me spell it out; I was hit with a zero-to-permaban about 7 months ago and after some back-and-forth, it was overturned... however I was extremely displeased with Riot's complete radio silence on the issue. I didn't even know what I had been permabanned for until days after it happened, I received no chat logs until even later than that.

Even after it was overturned I still wasn't told what happened.... today (Well yesterday now) Riot Tantram has finally given me what I wanted from the first moment this happened, information. I am not currently banned but I was briefly paranoid because of the recent permaban wave coupled with what seemed to be a random permaban that hit my account by a seeming rogue Riot agent.

This has been shown not to be the case, my account is fine, I was not falsely permabanned, Riot did nothing wrong. Though I still hold to the argument that the punishment was overly harsh.

replies.body: Guys he isn't wrong, there have been several cases of Riot's system making glitches and banning the wrong people.
he's talking about a manual review by a "rogue rioter" not the system

> [{quoted}](name=dapositiveviking,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-09-15T00:23:34.014+0000)
>
> he's talking about a manual review by a "rogue rioter" not the system

That is the speculation at this time. 

Until Riot tells me otherwise, all I can go by are the facts; I was manually hit with a zero-to-permaban punishment for what would be constituted as a  minor offense.

I've seen you post in a few place and you seem genuinely concerned, so wanted to give you the facts about what happened based on notes on your account.

You were banned by a human being because you were one of the most reported players in all of NA. Your account was perma-banned after hand review of behavior until you wrote in to Player Support in case the severe behavior was caused by an account compromise and/or to protect others' experience from being ruined. When you wrote in, the appropriate punishment of 2-weeks was assigned.

This is pretty normal. The instant feedback system is not the only review system in place, though it is certainly the most visible.

The escalation process is in place to ensure chronic offenders are given more severe penalties for repeated offenses. It is not in place to shield severe offenders from receiving an instant perma-ban or 14-day ban before chat restrictions.

"because you were one of the most reported players in all of NA"
That's like, almost an achievement, in a way. lol

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T00:45:53.694+0000)
>
> "because you were one of the most reported players in all of NA"
> That's like, almost an achievement, in a way. lol

I know, right?

Though I'd be willing to bet, put hard-money on it that the **_vast majority_** of those reports were illegitimate.

> [{quoted}](name=Gargamel Bot,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=0002000000000000000000020000,timestamp=2016-09-15T05:01:51.465+0000)
>
> is that going to be ur new defense? you got punished because of lots of false reports?

I don't remember saying I wasn't guilty. I remember saying over and over again that the punishment was unjust and a violation of ethical and disciplinary protocol. I still believe that but at least now I can see why Riot would make that call.

Rather than consider the validity, they went for raw report numbers, that is wrong but it is debatable.

> Rather than consider the validity, they went for raw report numbers, that is wrong but it is debatable.

When you were manually reviewed, reports were manually reviewed for validity. You are jumping to a lot of conclusions around process here.
When did they say they went by "raw report numbers"? You were one of the most validly reported people in NA. False positives wouldn't count as actual reports

> [{quoted}](name=ApocaIypse Meow,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=000200000000000000000002000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T13:31:00.446+0000)
>
> When did they say they went by "raw report numbers"? You were one of the most validly reported people in NA.

What's your point? it was not stated that the reports were valid which is what matters.
My point ( which I stated) is why would reports matter if they weren't valid?

> [{quoted}](name=ApocaIypse Meow,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=00020000000000000000000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T14:40:35.994+0000)
>
> My point ( which I stated) is why would reports matter if they weren't valid?

That's exactly my point. It's not complicated, you should be able to understand.

Right. You being validly reported hundreds of times for low level toxicity and having  a LONG history of being toxic led to your permanent ban. After review they lessened the punishment. They provided the last 3 chat logs from the games prior the review. The hundreds of toxic games prior led to the punishment. 

For someone who constantly ignores the logic in people's posts you display very little logic of your own.

You  ruined games for hundreds of people with your passive-aggressive/toxic chat.

The punishment didn't fit the crime, and it was adjusted. At this point you just complain on the boards for attention. And silly me, I take the bait.

Holy god.. Lol consistent low level toxicity and toxic behavior  is a valid  reason for punishment . Which you received. And if you refuse to alter your behavior your next punishment will escalate to a permanent ban. I know you're going to say something a long the lines of, " but it should have been a chat restriction" however, that's incorrect  two manual reviews put you at the 2 week ban tier. 

The first punishment was admittedly too severe, but the revised punishment is where they thought you should be placed.

Good luck in your journey to behavior reformation

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T00:45:53.694+0000)
>
> "because you were one of the most reported players in all of NA"
> That's like, almost an achievement, in a way. lol

One of the most reported really doesn't mean anything.....lots of reports are false anyways.

Yeah but if he's somehow still number one with a phrasing that suggests he was fairly ahead of others in reports, then there must have been at least some mildly existent reason, no matter how valid or invalid it was, consistently displaying in his games.
I understand that there are lots of false reports, but, statistically, “most reported” isn't going to happen unless you deserved a fair chunk of them
Even still, if you're getting more reported more than almost anyone else, false or not, it's impressive.
I feel like he should get a special summoner's icon to commemorate such a fine accomplishment

> [{quoted}](name=VyleExyle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=00020000000000000000000000020000,timestamp=2016-09-15T02:36:26.974+0000)
>
> I feel like he should get a special summoner's icon to commemorate such a fine accomplishment

I'd wear it with pride.

>I understand that there are lots of false reports, but, statistically, “most reported” isn't going to happen unless you deserved a fair chunk of them

Not necessarily, if you get falsely accused of murder, even if it's 50+ times, it doesn't mean you're guilty of murder.

I'd put down money on it right now that the vast majority of those reports were not substantiated and were instead, bullshit.... but it doesn't matter, at least now I know Riot's logic and am satisfied to have finally gotten a response to their actions. I don't feel betrayed anymore.

Not a good comparison. media and public like to crucify defendants that they see on tv without actually knowing what happened. However, the league reporting system only allows people to report after a game. if the 50+ people were present at the murder and reported it to police right after the fact then that is very much a strong case against you.
The roasts... Facts hurt.

> [{quoted}](name=XTRMN00B1337,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=000200000000000000000001,timestamp=2016-09-15T01:38:18.732+0000)
>
> The roasts... Facts hurt.

"Roasts"?
u wot m8?

This is exactly what I have been asking for , for several months even... here is the evidence that literally from the first day I got permabanned this is what I asked for http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/oob5BLxv-account-has-been-permanently-suspended-probably-a-glitch-in-the-system


 I say this with zero irony/sarcasm;  This is probably the greatest gift Riot could have possibly given me.
You were one of the most reported players in na, that doesn't say something?

> [{quoted}](name=XTRMN00B1337,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=00020000000000000000000100000001,timestamp=2016-09-15T20:13:14.316+0000)
>
> You were one of the most reported players in na, that doesn't say something?

It tells me that there are many leftists/feminists playing League of Legends, yes.

I don't consider my behavior to have been egregious... but leftists/feminists certainly do. Intelligent men on the other hand would see my behavior and not even come close to being in doubt;  My toxicity was on the low end of the scale, not worthy a zero-to-permaban or even zero-to-14-day-suspension.

However, Riot decides these things and not me; Notice as well that I have not been punished since march, what is that 7 months ? (ish) so you can sit there and hope for me to be permabanned but you are in for a long wait.

"So I was toxic and trying to be some alpha male and I got reported a lot, must be feminist who did it" 

Nice logic.

> [{quoted}](name=XTRMN00B1337,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=0002000000000000000000010000000100000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T20:30:45.602+0000)
>
> Insert strawman argument here

Nice logic.
Except you are consistently negative? Even if you aren't "tyler1 levels of toxic" but being a dick every single game hurts more than going tyler1 once in a 100 games.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T00:42:42.042+0000)
>
> I've seen you post in a few place and you seem genuinely concerned, so wanted to give you the facts about what happened based on notes on your account.
> 
> You were banned by a human being because you were one of the most reported players in all of NA. Your account was perma-banned after hand review of behavior until you wrote in to Player Support in case the severe behavior was caused by an account compromise and/or to protect others' experience from being ruined. When you wrote in, the appropriate punishment of 2-weeks was assigned.
> 
> This is pretty normal. The instant feedback system is not the only review system in place, though it is certainly the most visible.
> 
> The escalation process is in place to ensure chronic offenders are given more severe penalties for repeated offenses. It is not in place to shield severe offenders from receiving an instant perma-ban or 14-day ban before chat restrictions.

Dominick Destine deserved his punishments.

Tens of people surprised.
I think your numbers are off,  it's about tree fiddy suprised.
reading his logs though. he should have gotten a 10 game mute at most

> [{quoted}](name=scazzman,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=00020000000000000002,timestamp=2016-09-15T03:06:37.313+0000)
>
> reading his logs though. he should have gotten a 10 game mute at most

This is my logic and what left me feeling extremely betrayed by Riot.

But it doesn't matter, it's in the past and I got what I wanted, a response/explanation from Riot. I have had my faith increased in Riot.

Edit:
For those that are interested, here are the chat logs I was given back then for the zero-to-permaban punishment.

[6:42] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Come on ziggs...
[6:52] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): you were WAAAAY overextended
[10:55] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Far tankier than I expected.
[12:11] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Wukong, you have ZERO damage.
[12:21] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Just going to farm, bot has no damage, top has no damage, mid is basically afk.
[12:44] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): counter ignoring janna
[13:27] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): I did 65% HP of Galio's max HP
[13:28] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): you did noithing
[13:50] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): you have no damage
[21:16] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Yes. You are reacting much more slowly.
[21:21] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Your earlier assessment was correct.
[21:43] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): You should have been talking to yourself.
[21:47] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): That was a 37 second chase and you did not react.
[22:02] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): You were not dead, you were not oom.
[23:37] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): They'r eHEAVILY stacking MR
[25:25] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): dont engage
[29:51] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): We have zero perssure.
[29:57] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): They always have absolutely everything up.
[31:50] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): so who keeps troll voting no
[32:12] [All] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): I don't mind losing. However, it really irks me to be stuck with 4 feeders that troll vote no... sigh
[32:40] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): "clean up" says the feeder.
[32:51] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Just putting you on ignore, until you stop feeding you deserve no attention
[33:48] [All] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): gg


Game 2:
[12:44] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): ashe heal flash down 12:38
[13:36] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): I didn't expect all 5
[16:29] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): bot and mid failed so hard, it was never winnable
[16:58] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): "tilt" is just a word feeders use to make themselves feel better
[17:28] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): you hard-fed
[18:32] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): It's been over for awhile. Bot and mid hard-fed
[23:07] [All] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): gg


Game 3:
[4:31] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): xerath flash 4:19
[7:31] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): darius?!?
[7:34] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): DAIRUS?!??!
[7:37] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): What are you doing?
[7:48] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): They're both under 20% HP
[8:01] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): What were you doing?
[8:09] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): I am not fighting near you again
[9:29] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): who cares....
[9:38] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): you guys aren't even reacting to ganks.
[9:40] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): it was over before it started,
[9:57] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): You guys,a s in my teammates
[10:46] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): case in point
[14:47] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): you fed him without him even using flash?
[15:33] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): I can't gank if you free feed him, he had flash
[17:38] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): gj jihn
[17:42] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): finally, a teammate that reacts
[19:32] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): jinx flash 19:19
[20:25] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Amazing.
[21:03] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): oh well
[27:43] [All] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): /
[31:45] [All] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): I have not seen darius ult a single time all game.
[32:37] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): You and your duo queue fed them hard
[32:40] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): it doesn't matter who I focus
[32:51] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): putting you on ignore

Here are the issues I see with your logs:

1.  Calling people feeders
2.  Telling people they "do nothing" or "do no damage".
3.  Telling people you are putting them on ignore.
4.  Telling your team you are only going to farm.
5.  Telling teammtes you won't go to certain lanes anymore.

Is the the worst thing I've seen?  No.  With that said, you talk too much dude.  I can see why people report you.  Your logs are annoying.  They consist of very little constructive statements and are full of complaints.  

You don't say helpful things like , "maybe this item would help your damage output".  You simply say condescending stuff that makes the game experience worse.  Bottom line, the stuff you said does not help anything or anyone.  It doesn't change the outcome.  In fact, odds are it makes it worse.  

I'm not trying to be a jerk here, but I hope you can see how people would take this stuff the way I'm explaining it to you.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Droverson,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=0002000000000000000200000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T05:12:09.577+0000)
>
>you talk too much dude. 

The message rate in my chat log is at aprox. 1  message per 2.5 minutes, if that.

That is not "talking too much", good try with that nonsense though.

> Bottom line, the stuff you said does not help anything or anyone

What's your point? we're talking about toxicity. Your argument is garbage.

Well, I tried to offer my opinion.  You can say it's "garbage" all you want, but it doesn't change my mind.  In fact, your responses here further my opinion of you.  

You deserve your ban.  My opinion may be garbage, but at least I have never been, nor will be, banned.  Maybe, my opinion would be one you should consider.
these logs are hardly enough to go from zero to 14 day though
If he does that in a majority of games, I disagree.

But without warning Zero to Permaban (the original verdict)?

It's a little irritating to be on the receiving end of those comments, but I really don't think these are punishment worthy, not even a 10 game chat restriction. They show someone disgruntled at their team and pessimistic, yes, but handling it in a way that's about as civil as can be expected short of not typing at all.

I think the problem here, he doesn't even seem to care about what he said in these games,  what makes me (or Riot) believe this guy will ever stop doing this?  

I imagine he has more games and more logs to go along with this.  Riot just hasn't sent him those.  These 3 games are not the only games with his toxicity.  

I don't want to play games with someone like him.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Droverson,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=0002000000000000000200000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T05:12:09.577+0000)
>
> You don't say helpful things

I just noticed this part and wanted to say; You are talking complete nonsense.

Ex:
Summoner spell timers are extremely helpful and arguably one of the most important things that one can communicate to their teammates, something I do in almost every match I play. While I only did it a few times in these specific chat logs, it completely pillages and plunders your argument of "You don't say helpful things".

While you may be right, if you take my statement to the literal extent (which was not my intention, but oh well), that still does not take away from your justified punishment.  

One "helpful" comment amongst non-constructive ones doesn't exactly help your case.  

None of those players were going to listen to you.....even if your statements are correct.  This is because you are speaking to them like a total jerk and seem to forget that they are real people.  

heck, even in your encouragement of Jihn "gj jihn", you then add the non helpful comment of "finally a teammate that reacts".  You can't even say something positive without taking jabs at your other teammates.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T00:42:42.042+0000)
>
> 
> 
> You were banned by a human being because you were one of the most reported players in all of NA.

WOW. That's... I need to screenshot this, that's amazing. 

I notice however that you didn't state whether the reports were legitimate or not .

Also if I received that many reports and Riot determined that I was guilty, **shouldn't I have gotten a chat restriction long before I reached zero-to-permaban status?** that's my main grievance with this issue but whatever it's in the past.

>Your account was perma-banned after hand review of behavior until you wrote in to Player Support in case the severe behavior was caused by an account compromise and/or to protect others' experience from being ruined. When you wrote in, the appropriate punishment of 2-weeks was assigned.

Ok. That seems wrong but alright.

> The escalation process is in place to ensure chronic offenders are given more severe penalties for repeated offenses. It is not in place to shield severe offenders from receiving an instant perma-ban or 14-day ban before chat restrictions.

Ok that makes sense to some degree, though I would not consider myself a "**Severe offender**" at all.... but at least you have finally given me some information rather than maintaining radio silence for months on end. 

Thanks  Riot Tantram. Even if I am permabanned now (I haven't checked) I at least finally got a response.

> [{quoted}](name=Dominick Destine,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=00020000000000000004,timestamp=2016-09-15T03:21:42.697+0000)
> 
> I notice however that you didn't state whether the reports were legitimate or not .

v
>Your account was perma-banned **after hand review of behavior** until you wrote in to Player Support in case the severe behavior was caused by an account compromise and/or to protect others' experience from being ruined.** When you wrote in, the appropriate punishment of 2-weeks was assigned.**

> 
> Ok that makes sense to some degree, though I would not consider myself a "**Severe offender**" at all.... but at least you have finally given me some information rather than maintaining radio silence for months on end. 
> 
> Thanks  Riot Tantram. Even if I am permabanned now (I haven't checked) I at least finally got a response.

If this is your greatest achievement, then you need to get out a lot more.

> [{quoted}](name=SexySoapTurtle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=000200000000000000040001,timestamp=2016-09-15T22:39:12.395+0000)
>
> If this is your greatest achievement, then you need to get out a lot more.

Well I am a medical professional in real life and a university professor, along with having held multiple conferences that brought people from all over my nation.

I also have a huge pe....rceived amount of RP. No but seriously, although I consider myself to be fairly well accomplished in real life, my true life is online. I love being here and I love playing video games a lot more than doing stuff in RL.

I don't "need to get out more" I wish I could stay in 24/7.

i dislike when people say that video games arent real life, because although the experiences on screen very rarely have impact on the rest of your life, if you're interacting with other people thats pretty real. so nah you dont hve to get out more

> [{quoted}](name=Dominick Destine,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=seLkO3ZM,comment-id=0002000000000000000400010000,timestamp=2016-09-16T00:53:46.468+0000)

>

Sure, and i'm a sales rep making 200k plus a year. Your anti social bigoted attitude is why you need to get out more. Don't take it personal, its just that your complex is showing. So i do believe you need to *Get out more* But thats up to you to decide. I won't argue with you. Have a great day.

Success doesn't make you less of an ass. It just means you are good at your job and have the will and energy to apply it.
